name: places/ChIJ5VtavMdZwokR1j4sxITts34
formattedAddress: The Lighthouse Pier 61, Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: The Lighthouse Pier 61, Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Waterfront special-event space at Chelsea Piers with views overlooking the Hudson River.

originalText.text: I absolutely ADORE photographing weddings at the Lighthouse. The waterfront view is so gorgeous, especially during sunset. The venue is just as stunning at night, too. The staff is incredibly friendly and accommodating, and I always feel welcome there. Plus, there's ample parking, which is always a huge plus. This place is so photogenic, and I cannot recommend it higher to anyone looking for a gorgeous, iconic NYC location to get married.  We at Susan Stripling Photography LOVE it here!

originalText.text: This place is spectacular, the decoration is magnificent and what makes it special is that it is within sight of the Hudson River. The attention has no comparisons and so that everything is perfect they have parking that gives you the first 20 minutes free. I give this place 10/10.

text.text: This place is spectacular, the decoration is magnificent and what makes it special is that it is within sight of the Hudson River. The attention has no comparisons and so that everything is perfect they have parking that gives you the first 20 minutes free. I give this place 10/10.

originalText.text: Hosted my daughter's wedding at The Lighthouse on Friday night.  I have received literally dozens of emails, texts and calls from our guests all saying that the venue was spectacular, the food was outstanding,  the service was top notch, and of course - the sunset view was fabulous.  Thank you to the entire staff of The Lighthouse to making our event a great success.  Special shout-out to our event manager, Tanya Shevloff-Roth, for an unbelievable job.  Tanya kept everything running smoothly,  organized a quick rehearsal, and ensured we had a beautiful ceremony.  Highly recommend The Lighthouse for weddings and other events.

originalText.text: Gorgeous views and fun space for a corporate event. Catering (food, drinks, staff) is excellent. Only thing is that it's a long walk from the nearest subway, so wear comfortable shoes.

text.text: Gorgeous views and fun space for a corporate event. Catering (food, drinks, staff) is excellent. Only thing is that it's a long walk from the nearest subway, so wear comfortable shoes.

originalText.text: This post is overdue! Today is our 3rd wedding anniversary and it just feels like yesterday.  This is the most beautiful , romantic,  classic venue.  Before i choose The lighthouse,  I consulted 50 plus venues but nothing clicked. The entire team was super helpful and they made me feel special knowing how stressed I was as it was last minute & we did not have wedding planner.  The food was delicious! Views are breath taking overlooking Hudson. Big Kudos to the staff, the service was awesome and beyond my expectations.  I felt like a Queen on my special day & this wouldn't have been possible without the most caring staff that made everything so smooth & special.
